title: What's more tilting than being 0/2/0 on Draven?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TBRkwE93,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-15T23:57:49.096+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Draven wants all the kills from his team for his passive.

having a draven adc

i'd rather dodge

don't care how good the draven is

past experience tells me that there's like a 70% chance of a toxic draven main and a 30% chance of a first time draven
